verses.roman:
caturtha ślokete kari jagate āśīrvāda
sarvatra māgiye kṛṣṇa-caitanya-prasāda

synonyms: caturtha—fourth; ślokete—in the verse; kari—I make; jagate—for the world; āśīḥ-vāda—benediction; sarvatra—everywhere; māgiye—I am begging; kṛṣṇa-caitanya—of Lord Śrī Kṛṣṇa Caitanya Mahāprabhu; prasāda—the mercy.
translation: In the fourth verse I have invoked the benediction of the Lord upon all the world, praying to Lord Caitanya for His mercy upon all.
